title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you pull, run, and chat with 30+ open-weight models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API—installable via PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) adding Ollama models to chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper that adds shell completions, config files, and prompt templates for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you plug Ollama models into production-grade retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with NuGet package.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models as REST endpoints with streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel using slash commands.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, or chat with code via Ollama inside the editor.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community organization collecting unofficial SDKs for Go, Ruby, PHP, Swift, and more.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Official curated list of model tags (Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, etc.) with download stats and SHA sums.

title: r/ollama – Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, integrations, and troubleshooting around the Ollama ecosystem.
